name: Exercise 4 - First Person Game
description:
A walking simulator taking place in the Backrooms - a "mundane" set of office rooms that occupy a space outside normal reality. Navigate these strange spaces in search for a way out. This is a game made in Unity for an Intro To Game Programming class at NYU. The exercise instructed us to build a game with a 3d enviroment that conveyed narrative. A start menu was added for UI. Doors and activators (red orbs that open doors when clicked on) were added to allow for player interaction.

Made by Justin Xiong, Cameron Vong, and Jorge Velasquez.
